card.name: export
card.content:
[[report_type+*right+*help]]
[[Metric+Research_Policy+*type_plus_right+*default]]
[[Metric+Research_Policy+*type_plus_right+*add help]]
[[Metric+value type+*type plus right+*help]]
[[Metric+value type+*type plus right+*input]]
[[metric+question+*type plus right+*add help]]
[[metric+*title+*type plus right+*help]]
[[metric+designer+*type plus right+*help]]

value.name: report type+*right+*help
value.content: Answers/values for this metric are commonly found in this standard corporate report.

value.name: Metric+Research Policy+*type plus right+*add help
value.content: Who can assess the values for this metric? [[research policy|learn more]]

value.name: Metric+value type+*type plus right+*help
value.content: What kind of value should answers to this question be?

value.name: Metric+question+*type plus right+*add help
value.content: Please phrase precisely. Each metric value will directly answer this question.

value.name: metric+*title+*type plus right+*help
value.content: Will be appended to designer in metric's full name.

value.name: Metric+designer+*type plus right+*help
value.content: Who originally conceived this metric? (User or Company)
